name: Pesto Pasta 🥗
description: This classic pesto pasta recipe is a quick and easy way to satisfy your Italian cravings. The nutty and herbaceous pesto sauce is tossed with al dente pasta and topped with a generous sprinkle of grated Parmesan cheese for a delicious and comforting meal.
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Serve with a hard-boiled egg and sliced bell pepper.
